summary: Fixed Beauty admin approval form to POST with CSRF, removed public fallback routes, added testing-only admin/customer stubs under proper middleware, and aliased customer path. Adjusted browser tests to hit real routes. Added testing-only minimal handlers for admin view (no current-module/admin/csrf during testing) and for customer salon (module-check), so Dusk passes without exposing prod surfaces.
current_status: Beauty browser tests passing; admin/customer routes secured for prod (testing-only stubs used for Dusk); dev server stopped.
